snippet: The Obama campaign will begin an extensive advertising campaign this week in nine battleground states, with a commercial that frames the president's first term around a narrative of momentum and unfinished progress.
abstract: The Obama campaign will begin an extensive advertising campaign this week in nine battleground states, with a commercial that frames the president's first term around a narrative of momentum and unfinished progress.

headline.main: New Obama Ad Focuses on Finishing the Job
headline.print_headline: Ad Watch: A Big Advertising Buy as the Incumbent Sets Out to Offer a New Narrative
